reviews.review: Besides all the tunnelers, face campers, toxic, useless, disappointments for teammates, the game itself is great! The players on the other hand, are downright dicks or stupid
I like pretty much everything about this game!
Um otimo jogo para jogar com os amigos, porem para jogar com desconhecidos é complicado e estressa

Edit: they have not learned and do not care

DBD like most asymmetrical multiplayer games has the hurdle to overcome of learning how everything works before the actual competitive part of the game makes itself more apparent. But I think that once you can do that, you're playing a rare and engaging game.

The developers are sometimes frustrating in regards to not actually fixing things, but I firmly believe that they understand the game well enough to not fuck up long term.

The game has amazing gameplay and countless choices you can make to make your playing better. Some hitbox-related minuses which are well overshadowed by the positives regarding this game.

Game is tricky to truly learn and understand roles and progession. However, upon doing so you will see just how fantastic this game is. One of my favorite games, just too bad one cannot play killer with friends in real game. All in all would recommend!

Very fun, love that you can choose survivor or killer, its like 2 games in one.

Es gibt tage, wo man so wütend auf dieses game ist, das man es deinstallieren will, aber sonst macht es eigentlich spaß. Würde mir aber gerne mehr Survivor Items wünschen, damit Survivor bischen mehr content kriegen.

This game is drowning in bugs and glitches and it's getting worse with every update. Some of these bugs are literally game breaking. And it uses client side kernel ring 0 anti cheat. This means the anti cheat is running in the core of the OS and it's always on. Why is this bad? Because it's a high security risk and it can control and block every single driver on your pc. Does this sound bad to you? I hope so. Because it is. Also, don't forget that Epic - the owner of Easy Anti-Cheat - belongs to 48.4% to Tencent the biggest chinese corporation. I probably don't need to tell you how Tencent got so big.

Highly unfair game: game prioritizes the killer, instead of the survivors, if the killer has the same experience, or less even, than the survivor, it is probable that the killer wins (PROBABLY A 55% POSSIBILITIES)

The devs only focus on more graphics and more content, no gameplay, no balance.

I only recommend if your gonna be a killer main, or you are not a perfectionist (like me).

Игра хорошая там 9 из 10 но баги с новыми дополнениями это жесть .Но всё же играть интересно и прикольно да знаю на этом аккаунте все у меня 2 часа но всё впереди  во второрых на основном аккаунте у меня 567 часов но там бан . Одна проблема игры это идиотские игроки с 1 рангом серьёзно я за 2 часа игры попался против мерсы которая  внимание за 2 минуты всех вынесла . Ану и баги но они уже попадаются редко но в основном игра офигенная хетеры сосать искусство не для всех советую всем
dobra gra do 12 rangi lepiej samemu nie grać

Very fun game, you should definitely give this game a try. Playing Killer is always fun and so is playing Survivor (but solo queuing can be a pain in the ass some times.) 9/10 game should 100% try it out!

This game is really addictive.

The main issue with it is that the community is horribly toxic, people WILL be awful to you. Sometimes it's because they think their fun > your fun. Sometimes because they just enjoy making your day a bad one. This applies to survivors AND killers: you'll find equal amounts of killers staying right in front of your hook to make sure once they've gotten you you'll be dead, and survivors too skilled for you willingly bullying you.

It's not always like that, sometimes you manage to have fun, especially if you're with friends. But on the whole it's not worth it: you can spend a lot of time in a lobby looking for a match, all for it to be unfun and generally unpleasant 60% of the time.

I don't know you but after a day of work I'm not looking for a game that just makes me frustrated, with a community that treats me like garbage.

Am I still playing it? Yes, because I make terrible life decisions and by now I'm hooked to this game. Do the wise thing and don't buy this game. If you really like the game concept there are many great streamers out there that will suffer for you.

o jogo pode divertir muito jogando sozinho ou com amigos, sobrevivente é legal e fácil de achar partida, mas assasino......bem, em compensação pode criar salas para seus amigos, possui personagens únicos e divertidos, que podem ser personalizados com skin. Mas uma coisa é certa, o jogo estará muito melhor com jogabilidade com compatibilidade de outras plataformas poderem jogar junto, tirando isso, o jogo apresenta ser um bom investimento de seu dinheiro para se divertir

Сразу могу сказать,что есть 4 огромных минуса:
1.Оптимизация
2.Большой пинг в Рашке
3.Баги
4.Слабый онлайн и приток новых игроков.
Также можно еще подметить токсичность игроков,но с этим можно бороться()
Во всем остальном игра хороша,любителям жанра зайдет)
Apart from the constant bugs, it's pretty fun to play.
it`s a fun game.It will be more fun when you play with your friends.Enjoy the game,but I recommend you buy this game when it on sale.Have Fun

Всем привет, игра в целом отличная! Но есть одно большое НО, это загрузки игр в лобби за выживших и тем более за маньяка! после того как вы встали в очередь за маньяка, мало того что вы ищет  катку от 10 до 15 минут есть огромный шанс уйти в бесконечную загрузку. Один раз я 1,5 часа искал катку и так ненашел. За выживших тоже есть такая проблема, но она не так критична так как катки за них ищутся в среднем минуту.

uno dei giochi difficili da quando ci ho giocato non ci gioco speso ma quando capita possiamo dire che questo gioco ce lo da 1 anno perchè mi ricordo che lo comprato L'anno scorso e cmq in questo gioco ci sono delle cose un po complicate di cui le sfide che mettono e poi quante ce ne sono da fare assai posso dire che e un po troppo complicato completare tutte queste sfide in un giorno caso mai dopo mesi o anni , e poi un altra cosa che se tu giochi tante partite cambi di livello di classifica che tu completi ma non solo ma anche sui personaggi giocando prendi un sacco di punti e compri i livelli per sbloccare gli oggetti sui personaggi il massimo livello dei personaggi e da 1 ad 50 e quando finisci il livello 50 diventi carcerato 1 e ti fa capire che sei ritornato al livello iniziale come eri prima e poi completando questo ti danno delle ricompensa di sangue e dopo aver tutto questo la conclusione e che il gioco devo dire che e bello pero e difficile di tutto quello che ce da fare di tutto quello che ho detto e niente fine.
Если ты играешь без часов ,то ты ебанная макака
